name: iPhone 4 & 5 Wood Skin
description:
Where's My Hippo worked with Lazerwood Industries in Seattle to make a few custom covers for the back of your iPhone.
About what Lazerwood does...
Each cover is precision-cut for a perfect fit on your iPhone. Real, FSC certified wood is used instead of synthetic or look alike "stickers". As the wood ages, so does the phone cover.
Each cover undergoes a multi-step hand finishing process that helps each cover bring out the beauty of its wood type.
Attaching, Removing and Re-Using the Cover:
The anti-residue adhesive makes these covers effortless to apply, and if you decide to take it off, you wont damage your phone doing so. iPhone 4 users can even reuse the cover. Unfortunately, iPhone 5 users most likely won't be able to reuse the cover as it does not have a glass back.

name: T.H.C. California Fleece
description: It's not quite a sweater, not quite a fleece. American Apparel calls it a California Fleece. Light enough not to be bulky, but also warm enough for an evening at the beach. Our store is filled with illustration based designs featuring Herbert. This time we wanted to get back to our creative side but not in the typical illustration way we had developed Whereâ€™s My Hippo shirts around. This time we focused on photography. To get started on this design, we rifled through a collection of old photos from 2008. Everything in this folder had been shot on a 1.3 megapixel Olympus digital camera. One of the shots was taken on a street (which shall remain nameless) in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles, CA. The palm lined streets of Southern California are as iconic as the stars on Hollywood Blvd. so shooting a good picture of them is pretty easy. As we were scrolling through this album of pictures, we stopped on the picture used in this design. We ended up editing the image down to three colors and having it screen-printed on a black American Apparel California Fleece. The back features a small upper white hippo print just below the neckline. Soft and warm. Available for purchase exclusively through our online store Consider ordering a size up, these (like many American Apparel goods) run small, or a "European Fit". Very limited quantities, no exchanges. Returns are okay if shirt is returned in unworn condition. If you are ordering 2, considering the 2 for $70 deal and free shipping package located here If you have questions, let Herbert know via Instagram or Twitter for the fastest reply (@WheresMyHippo). Or you can use the contact page. *IMPORTANT* Orders are shipped using USPS Priority Mail domestically and either UPS or FedEx Internationally. If this is a problem, please indicate such in your order instructions.

name: 5 Stickers
description: All vinyl. Assorted sizes and designs.

name: The Oatmeal 3/4
description:
Made of our vintage-inspired, sustainable Eco-Heather, this color-blocked henley features 3/4-length raglan sleeves, three-button front and a slightly rounded bottom hem. Part of the eco-friendly Alternative Earth collection. Unisex regular fit. Two color screenprint on the upper left chest. Custom label sewn on the bottom left portion of the garmet.

A sticker is included with every purchase.

For Sizing, please check here:

http://www.alternativeapparel.com/Mens-3-4-Sleeve-Raglan-Henley/dp/B009013KQQ

Model's Size in Photos:

Photo 1: Model is 5'10" with a 32" waist, wearing a Medium.

name: The Blue 3/4
description:
We are introducing our Standard Line. This line consist of shirts that will be regularly in stock for your purchase. All of these designs will consists of minimal hippo related elements with a focus on quality as well as maintaining a consisting stock. 

Each shirt comes screenprinted and features a custom label sewn on the bottom hem. 

This is the second garment released under the Standard Line and features Royal Blue sleeves with a oatmeal chest.

From Alternative Apparel: Made of our vintage-inspired, sustainable Eco-Heather, this color-blocked henley features 3/4-length raglan sleeves, three-button front and a slightly rounded bottom hem. Part of the eco-friendly Alternative Earth collection. Unisex regular fit.

A sticker is included with every purchase.

name: Girl's Logo Tank
description: Show your sporty style with this racerback tank featuring contrasting neck and arm holes and a slightly rounded, merrowed bottom hem. Made of Alternative Apparel's unbelievably soft Eco-Heather for a retro look with sustainable appeal, two color screen print featured across the center chest. Custom sewn label on the bottom left.

name: Men's Logo Tank
description: Perfect for layering up or wearing alone, this classic tank comes with a 2 color screen print on the center chest. Features a self-bound neck and armholes and blind stitching on bottom hem. Made of Alternative Apparel's signature Cotton Jersey for superior softness

name: Hippo California Fleece
description:
It's not quite a sweater, not quite a fleece. American Apparel calls its a California Fleece. Light enough not to be bulky, yet warm enough for the beach at night.
 
The front features a Hippo Head in the upper left breast along.
 
The back has a full size print featuring the year it all started, in the city that started the search (2008 & Los Angeles).
 
ORDER A SIZE UP, these (like many American Apparel goods) run small, or if we want to class it up, we'll call it a "European Fit". 
 
Very limited quantities, no exchanges. Returns are okay.
 
If you have questions, let Herbert know via Instagram or Twitter for the fastest reply (@WheresMyHippo).
 
*IMPORTANT* Orders are shipped using USPS Priority Mail domestically and either UPS or FedEx Internationally. If this is a problem, please indicate such in your order instructions.

name: Survival Pack
description:
Limited edition survival packs to help you in your search for Herbert.
Each survival pack includes:
(6) Tiny Hippo Stickers
(3) Medium Hippo Stickers
(2) Giant Hippo Stickers
(1) 2.25" Pin
(1) 18"x 24" Folded "Thin Print" Poster

The thin print in each survival pack will only be printed 5 times. Then another design will replace that one, and so on!

The first print series has sold out. 

New Print's now being sent in new survival packs.

All conveniently packaged in a water resistant poly-bag, approved for rain forest, desert, ocean/beach and underwater hippo searching.
